name: NFT Marketplace
description: The marketplace contract where users can list, sell and buy NFTs from the valid collections of the game.

name: Wrapped PFT
description: An ERC-20 version of the native PFT.

name: General NFT
description: The NFT contract for general non-fungible tokens.

name: Porble
description: The NFT contract for the porble collection.

name: Token Vault
description: Vault contract. Receives payments for specific operation IDs. Allows the owner to withdraw PFT or any ERC-20 tokens owned by the contract.

name: USDP
description: USDP is a representation of the USDC tokens that have been bridged from other chains to the PF-chain. The amount of USDC locked up in the bridge is equivalent to the amount of USDP in circulation on the PF-chain.

name: PFT Staking
description: Allows users to stake a specific amount of PFT. The users can unstake and withdraw part or all of their PFT whenever they want.

name: Architect
description: The NFT contract for the architect collection.

name: Hero
description: The NFT contract for the hero collection.
